name: Patricia M. VAN DINE (Danylak), Respondent, v. George D. GYURISKA, Sr., Petitioner

parties: Patricia M. VAN DINE (Danylak), Respondent, v. George D. GYURISKA, Sr., Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of August, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted but limited to the following issue:
Did the Superior Court err by failing to grant Petitioner a de novo hearing?
It is further ordered that the case be submitted on briefs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
697 A.2d 983
Patricia M. VAN DINE (Danylak), Respondent, v. George D. GYURISKA, Sr., Petitioner.
No. 724 M.D.1996.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 15, 1997.
